mapper.select: select efs.expfilestuno, ef.srcfilename, efs.submittime, ef.fileno, es.expstuno from experiment_stu es join experiment e on es.expno = e.expno join experiment_files ef on ef.expno = e.expno left outer join experiment_files_stu_latest efs on efs.fileno = ef.fileno and efs.expstuno = es.expstuno where es.stuno = #{stuno} and es.expstuno = #{expstuno}
